entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 7:18PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG WINDS AND HEAVY PRECIPITATION TUESDAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY... A strong low pressure system is poised to move along the Aleutian Chain Tuesday morning before entering the southern Bering Sea Tuesday evening and overnight. Southeasterly winds initially pick up Tuesday morning as the front lifts from the North Pacific to over the area on Tuesday. Winds look to peak mid-morning Tuesday

entry.summary: ...Patchy Dense Fog Still Possible Through 9 AM...
